meanings.definition: Work jointly on an activity or project.
meanings.sent1: The students collaborates on the science experiment.
meanings.sent2: The team collaborates to create a presentation.
meanings.sent3: The animals in the zoo collaborates to plan a surprise for the zookeeper.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky collaborates to create a beautiful night scene.
meanings.sent5: The flowers and bees collaborates to make a colorful garden.

meanings.definition: Cooperate with others in order to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The friends collaborates to organize a surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The countries collaborates to address climate change.
meanings.sent3: The toys in the playroom collaborates to clean up before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: The colors on the canvas collaborates to form a stunning painting.
meanings.sent5: The ingredients in the recipe collaborates to create a delicious dish.
